attributes.action: In the event that Scotland votes NO to independence, the English should get ta referendum to eject Scotland from the Union
attributes.additional_details: After the Scots vote NO to independence, the English should be balloted to see if they still want them to remain in the United Kingdom

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition Title: Referendum to Remove Scotland from the UK

Created by: Jack Chambers

Closing Date: 30/03/2015
